sentences.en: Ah yes, but think of all the family life they're missing.
sentences.cn: 是这样，不过别忘了他们错过了多少天伦之乐。

sentences.en: He seemed to know intuitively that I must be missing my mother.
sentences.cn: 他似乎凭直觉知道我肯定在想母亲。

sentences.en: I'm only just beginning to take it in that he's still missing.
sentences.cn: 我刚刚才开始反应过来，原来他仍然下落不明。

sentences.en: It is not unknown for valuable display items to go, ahem, missing.
sentences.cn: 贵重的展品，呃哼，丢失的话，会众人皆知。

sentences.en: Searchers have found three mountain climbers missing since Saturday.
sentences.cn: 搜救人员已经找到了周六失踪的3名登山者。

sentences.en: She came in and raised hell. Her son'ssports bag was missing.
sentences.cn: 她进来大吵大闹。她儿子的运动包丢了。

sentences.en: She hurled the ashtray across the room, narrowly missing my head.
sentences.cn: 她用力把烟灰缸从房间那头扔过来，差点砸到我的脑袋。

sentences.en: She was only six and still missing her front teeth.
sentences.cn: 她才6岁，门牙还没长出来。

sentences.en: She was very glum and was obviously missing her children.
sentences.cn: 她郁郁寡欢，显然在惦念自己的孩子们。

sentences.en: Supply the missing word(s) and you could win a T-shirt.
sentences.cn: 填出所缺少的单词，你就会赢得一件T恤。

sentences.en: The keys have been missing for ages.
The team is trying to ferret out missing details.
sentences.cn: 该队正在试图找到遗失的细节。

sentences.en: The Turkish security forces have started searching for the missing men.
sentences.cn: 土耳其安全部队已经开始搜寻失踪人员。

sentences.en: They've been saying on the radio she was missing.
sentences.cn: 广播一直在报道她失踪了。

sentences.en: Two of her front teeth were missing.
We found the missing piece of the jigsaw under the chair.
sentences.cn: 我们在椅子下面找到了那块丢失的拼图。

sentences.en: What is missing, however, is an internal, artistic cohesion.
sentences.cn: 不过，缺乏的是一种内在的艺术凝聚力。

sentences.en: When they told me she had gone missing I was totally stunned.
sentences.cn: 他们告诉我她不见了时，我当时完全惊呆了。

phrases.tran_cn: 推定存在于人猿与人类之间的过渡动物；缺少的一环

trans.tran_cn: 找不到的，丢失的，失踪的，遗漏的
trans.tran_en: something that is missing is not in its usual place, so that you cannot find it
